Comments_List: General knowledge on relevant and current international relations topics; critical thinking skills; research skills; theory building and writing skills.

This course is a great overview of current and relevant issues in international relations. It has the added value of being an opportunity to learn and to practice social sciences research skills, including theory conceptualization and research design. Prof Sanchez is very engaging and the class is lively and dynamic.
